an6.117:1.1: “Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo kaye kayanupassi viharitum.
an6.117:1.3: Kammaramatam, bhassaramatam, niddaramatam, sanganikaramatam, indriyesu aguttadvaratam, bhojane amattannutam.
an6.117:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme appahaya abhabbo kaye kayanupassi viharitum.
an6.117:2.1: Cha, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo kaye kayanupassi viharitum.
an6.117:2.3: Kammaramatam, bhassaramatam, niddaramatam, sanganikaramatam, indriyesu aguttadvaratam, bhojane amattannutam.
an6.117:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cha dhamme pahaya bhabbo kaye kayanupassi viharitun”ti.
